entry.title: ConnectShares script
entry.content:
I have added an axample script for mounting network shares automatically on startup for and Active Directory bound Mac. This script uses the Distiquished Name (DN) of the user to determine what shares should be mounted for the user.

The repository is here, and includes a plist that can be used to implement the script as a LaunchAgent. Go here for instructions on packaging this up with The Luggage.

entry.title: ZCM Install Script
entry.content:
I have added my ZCM install script to my github account. This is a vbs script that I use to make the ZCM installer more friendly in the Microsoft Deployment Toolkit.

The script is here.

To use the script, place it in a directory with the PreAgent install exe and import into MDT as an application with source files. Set the install command to cscscript install.vbs

A more extensive explanation of the development of the script can be found in this blog post.
